item.title: Resetting?
item.description:
Resetting?

I figured I may as well start this website thing. I made a bluesky account with this domain, and thought “maybe it’d be cool to put that website that I used to have back up.”

There’s no information here yet. Just look at the header if you want any contacts or whatever.
